abstract: Ian McKellen and Derek Jacobi, revered British actors who appear together in PBS sitcom Vicious, will both be grand marshals at 2015 gay pride parade in New York City and first-time attendees; visit comes at time of high significance following Supreme Court's landmark ruling on same-sex marriage; both actors are gay.
lead_paragraph: The British actors, grand marshals and first-timers at New York’s parade on Sunday, reflect on the progress they’ve seen in their often parallel lives.

headline.main: Ian McKellen and Derek Jacobi in a Gay Pride March Debut
headline.print_headline: Two Stars in a Gay Pride March Debut

snippet: The British actors, grand marshals and first-timers at New York’s parade on Sunday, reflect on the progress they’ve seen in their often parallel lives.
